summary: I’m trying not to offend anyone but can people shut up about phan (well not shut up about it but stop saying “no more phan, I’m...
body: I’m trying not to offend anyone but can people shut up about phan (well not shut up about it but stop saying “no more phan, I’m respecting them”). Everyone now has suddenly stopped shipping it since Dans video. Everyone now says people don’t respect them if we mention it at all. But guess what. Phan was never fully confirmed. Yes dan said they were a thing but that doesn’t mean they still are, of they still could be together but that doesn’t mean we have to stop shipping phan. We’ve always shipped phan. Dan and Phil created phan. Just because in Dans video he said him and Phil want to keep their personal life private (which I would too) doesn’t mean we can’t ship phan. If they tell us to stop.. that’s when we stop. They said a long time ago they were okay with it (and of course things can change). Yes in Dans video he did mention people forcing themselves into his personal life making it worse but not everyone does that. Most of us who ship phan are very respectful towards people and will stop when it becomes too much. We will stop if told to and correct our mistakes when realised they have been made. So, please, stop saying all this crap about phan just because now it’s apparently illegal to everyone. And feel free to correct me on anything I may have gotten wrong <3

body: Of all the things dan said about phil in that video, ‘phil is my safe place’ affects me the most. Imagine having someone you can trust about EVERYTHING, share every damn insecurity you have with them… It’s wild and I’m so happy they have that kind of connection.

blog.description:
+giada | she/her | 24 | +my gifs |
I follow from somearehuman

tags: like now it’s dan’s voice that I hear say these things in my mind? how wild?
summary: I agree so much with your post. Things don't hit differently per se, however knowing the context.. Like, we have always known...
question: I agree so much with your post. Things don't hit differently per se, however knowing the context.. Like, we have always known how much dnp care about each other but to hear Dan say that meeting Phil made him feel safe for the first time in his life since he was a child? That he needed him? To hear him say that they're actual soulmates without any hint of sarcasm in his voice? That's a lot. Those are things we didn't know about and that knowledge now makes me see them in a  warmer light.
answer: yes that’s exactly what I meant. and to me that is even more important than hearing dan say “yes we’re together”. I will take “we’re real best friends, companions through life, actual soulmates” over that every day. I mean, I saw people complaining that there was no confirmation and I’m like..?? he literally said the most beautiful things about phil?? the most pure?? the most heartfelt?? hearing him talk about phil like that, with such a soft and sincere voice was so heartmelting. his little shy smile when he said that he takes it as a compliment that people want to know more? even that is something we didn’t know before. it was always discussed how proud of their relationship dan always seems, but now he literally told us. so yes, this is what hits hard.

reblog.comment: yes that’s exactly what I meant. and to me that is even more important than hearing dan say “yes we’re together”. I will take “we’re real best friends, companions through life, actual soulmates” over that every day. I mean, I saw people complaining that there was no confirmation and I’m like..?? he literally said the most beautiful things about phil?? the most pure?? the most heartfelt?? hearing him talk about phil like that, with such a soft and sincere voice was so heartmelting. his little shy smile when he said that he takes it as a compliment that people want to know more? even that is something we didn’t know before. it was always discussed how proud of their relationship dan always seems, but now he literally told us. so yes, this is what hits hard.

I will take “we’re real best friends, companions through life, actual soulmates” over that every day. I mean, I saw people complaining that there was no confirmation and I’m like..?? he literally said the most beautiful things about phil?? the most pure?? the most heartfelt?? hearing him talk about phil like that, with such a soft and sincere voice was so heartmelting. his little shy smile when he said that he takes it as a compliment that people want to know more? even that is something we didn’t know before. it was always discussed how proud of their relationship dan always seems, but now he literally told us. so yes, this is what hits hard.

See the 'Links' page below for the rest of the directory pages, however be aware that several of the pages are now password protected, which unfortunately is a precaution we have to take.

Please appreciate that it is a privilege for this stuff to be available, so if anyone thinks it's funny to leak the password to certain parties, then the privileges will be taken away and I don't know if I can be bothered to set all my sites up for a third time...

summary: Dan Howell, Phan, and this Blog
title: Dan Howell, Phan, and this Blog
body:
Llamod here!

This is a preliminary post to see who’s around on tumblr and who would like to restart a conversation on this blog and/or Phanswers…I’m in the middle of a summer program until the end of this month but then I should have some free time to discuss Dan’s video (and other things!)

As for how I’m posting on this blog, it’s a long story…But most importantly, K is not back. However, I may be returning with a different special guest whom I love dearly and whom I met around 6 years ago when I first joined the Phan Directory. I am looking forward to restarting this blog and going over everything that’s happened since I was last active.

Hope everyone is doing well and I’m super excited to be back!

-Llamod

blog.name: x-purposeful-potential-x
blog.title: Ya Know, I Dont Even Know
blog.description: a little gay, a lot a sad

summary: Ya know I’ve been in this bitch since late 2012 like D&P basically raised me and each year I can’t fathom how proud I am from...
body: Ya know I’ve been in this bitch since late 2012 like D&P basically raised me and each year I can’t fathom how proud I am from the progress they made on the bbc to being in a Disney movie/show to going on not one but 2 world tours!!!! However this has got to be the proudest I think I’ve ever been because it feels like Dan and Phil are finally fully living their truths, embracing the unknown, and welcoming change Bc that’s what life is! All the fans that left are welcomed back with open arms because we’re a family, always have been and always will be and I’m just so happy and proud! I just hope they don’t disappear completely again

summary: The skeleton was designed for ‘Daniel Howell’s’ 2019 merchandise range. The design initially started out as a water colour...
caption: The skeleton was designed for ‘Daniel Howell’s’ 2019 merchandise range. The design initially started out as a water colour painting (see below), After a few different iterations of the skeletons pose, We landed on an ink “technical style” drawing. Which would translate to a silkscreen print a lot better than the previous designs. (Art by https://www.neilmccathie.com/)

blog.name: hearteyesloveloveeyes
blog.title: Phan Is Actually Real
blog.description: No I can say it is (or at least was) true

tags: this is the state of the phandom rn
cant we all just get along
summary: I think a lot of people are missing the point of Dans coming out video just to stir up drama. I am a huge fan of imallexx but...
body: I think a lot of people are missing the point of Dans coming out video just to stir up drama. I am a huge fan of imallexx but his video was just stupid! Yes I get that we shouldn’t of pushed him and some of the demons did go to far but Dan didn’t feel comfortable coming out for so many reasons and that’s what it’s like for a lot of people. It not only Involves work (for dan and Phil that means YouTube) but also home life/family, friends and so much extra stuff. Dan explained a lot of really messed up stuff that happened in his childhood that made him afraid to come out and that has nothing to do w the phandom! I’m just so tired or ex-phannies, anti’s, casual watchers (even people just jumping onto the band wagon) hating on the phandom when most of us just want dan and Phil to be happy! We are not creepy 12 year stalkers (well some of us are) we have all grown up since 2012 and I just wish other people can see that! I am so proud of dan and that he finally had the courage to come out and to live his truth but I just wish we could enjoy this time and spread our love for dan and Phil and not hate on others! Anyway rant over I’m just tired of all the hate shippers have been getting lately!

reblog.comment: I think a lot of people are missing the point of Dans coming out video just to stir up drama. I am a huge fan of imallexx but his video was just stupid! Yes I get that we shouldn’t of pushed him and some of the demons did go to far but Dan didn’t feel comfortable coming out for so many reasons and that’s what it’s like for a lot of people. It not only Involves work (for dan and Phil that means YouTube) but also home life/family, friends and so much extra stuff. Dan explained a lot of really messed up stuff that happened in his childhood that made him afraid to come out and that has nothing to do w the phandom! I’m just so tired or ex-phannies, anti’s, casual watchers (even people just jumping onto the band wagon) hating on the phandom when most of us just want dan and Phil to be happy! We are not creepy 12 year stalkers (well some of us are) we have all grown up since 2012 and I just wish other people can see that! I am so proud of dan and that he finally had the courage to come out and to live his truth but I just wish we could enjoy this time and spread our love for dan and Phil and not hate on others! Anyway rant over I’m just tired of all the hate shippers have been getting lately!

Yes I get that we shouldn’t of pushed him and some of the demons did go to far but Dan didn’t feel comfortable coming out for so many reasons and that’s what it’s like for a lot of people. I am so proud of dan and that he finally had the courage to come out and to live his truth but I just wish we could enjoy this time and spread our love for dan and Phil and not hate on others! Anyway rant over I’m just tired of all the hate shippers have been getting lately!
